channel.title: Clickable stats

item.title: Clickable stats
item.dc:creator: @cammyPVPftw cammyPVPftw
item.description:
@cammyPVPftw wrote:

whats wrong with this code? it opens the interface but doesn’t execute. Also i only want it to work in the safezone.

[code=java]if (c.safeZone()) {

c.outStream.createFrame(27);
c.attackSkill = true;
c.defenceSkill = false;
c.strengthSkill = false;
c.healthSkill = false;
c.rangeSkill = false;
c.prayerSkill = false;
c.mageSkill = false;
break;
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You can’t use this in the wilderness!”);
return;
}[/code]

Read full topic
